Instance.description: A PlayAudio SuperInteraction that has a tiered menu.

Tunable.name: audio_start_event
Tunable.description: The script event to listen for from animation so we know when to start the music and vocals.

Tunable.name: audio_stop_event
Tunable.description: The script event to listen for from animation so we know when to stop the music and vocals.

TunableEnum.name: instrument_participant
TunableEnum.description: The participant that the music will play on.

TunableVariant.name: mouthpiece_target
TunableVariant.description: The participant of mine that mouthpieces must target as their mouthpiece target. e.g. if they are targeting the actor sim of this interaction, their mouthpiece target would be targetsim, my mouthpiece target would be actor. If all of us are targeting a certain object then both would be object.

TunableEnum.name: enabled
TunableEnum.description: The participant of mine that mouthpieces must target.

TunableList.name: music_styles
TunableList.description: List of music styles that are available for this interaction.

Tunable.description: A music style available for this interaction.

Tunable.name: play_multiple_clips
Tunable.description: If true, the Sim will continue playing until the interaction is cancelled or exit conditions are met.

Tunable.name: use_buffer
Tunable.description: If true, this interaction will add the buffer tuned on the music track to the length of the track. This is tunable because some interactions, like Practice, use shorter audio clips that don't require the buffer.
